review.title: “Awesomely wonderful company to work with. Lots of learning and great growth opportunities”
review.pros: Pros – 1. Friendly environment2. Excellent learning opportunities3. Good and caring Management4. No office politics (at least right now...lets see what happens when the company grows bigger)5. Recognition of your work6. Great opportunity of career growth7. Good salary hikes8. Very little attrition
review.cons: Cons – The company shall start focussing on local Indian market as well. Right now the concentration is in US and Europe but keeping in view the turbulent times in past a little more exposure in Indian market shall certainly help.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The company shall start focussing on local Indian market as well. Right now the concentration is in US and Europe but keeping in view the turbulent times in past a little more exposure in Indian market shall certainly help.
